pageContext.claim: “I took that test when I got my last physical, and the doctor said that’s one of the highest scores we’ve ever seen.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump passed a cognitive test known as the Montreal Cognitive Assessment, which tests for “mild cognitive dysfunction" It's a ten minute test and patients are asked to draw a clock, animals and other objects. Patients can receive up to 30 points. Any score 26 and above is considered normal. Anything lower indicates dementia.Trump scored a 30, but so would most people
